message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm looking for $120 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $95, but that's as high as I can go.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need $108 to feel comfortable selling the product.

I'm really interested in the product, Alice, but I'm afraid $108 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you in the middle again, so I'm offering $102. This is my final offer, I'm not willing to go any higher.
